Titles.jpn: NITABOH　仁太坊-津軽三味線始祖外聞

Summaries.eng: At a young age, Nitaroh is stricken with an illness that leaves him blind. He inherits the shamisen guitar once used by his mother and is taught its basics by a blind travelling shamisen player. In time with the help of friends old and new, he walks the paths that leads to his ultimate fate - that of founder of the Tsugaru style of shamisen play.
Summaries.jpn: 幼い頃、二太郎は彼を盲目にする病気に襲われました。彼はかつて母親が使用していた三味線ギターを継承し、盲目の旅行三味線奏者からその基本を教えられています。新旧の友人の助けを借りて、彼は彼の究極の運命、つまり三味線の津軽スタイルの創設者の運命につながる道を歩きます。

Aliases: Nitaboh: the Founding of Tsugaru-Style Shamisen
